summary: FOR THE 3RD TIME THE CLUSTER HAS GONE OUT.  THIS RESULTS IN THE SPEEDOMETER, TEMPERATURE GAUGE AND OTHERS TO STOP WORKING.  EACH TIME I AM EXPECTED TO TAKE MY VEHICLE TO A CHEVROLET MECHANIC FOR DIAGNOSIS AND PART REPLACEMENT AT $700.00+ EACH TIME.  THIS MODEL HAS NO RECALL.  I AM FED UP WITH PAYING THIS MUCH EVERY 3-4 YEARS FOR A DEFECTIVE PART.  THERE HAS NEVER BEEN ANY SIGN BEFORE IT GOES OUT.
